Monachopsis-the subtle but persistent feeling of being out of place

I know this doesn't help that much, but Iâ€™ve been feeling the same way for a while and I just thought it was interesting to know that there's (kind of) a word for it

I was thinking of talking to one person directly, just because I think it would be beneficial to tell each other experiences, and then to expand on them in conversation. I have read many other posts on this subreddit and many of them have helped me to understand myself, but I thought it would help more to talk to someone
